Hearty

Pulled Pork

this is a title

A tasteful marriage between bird and pig…tender pieces of Irish Chicken and mild smoked ham in a rich creamy white sauce, cooked with white wine, herbs and spices in a shortcrust pastry base topped with a puff pastry lid and sprinkled with poppy seeds. Made with 100% Irish chicken and ham and using only the freshest ingredients.

  • Cooking Instructions

    • (50%): Irish Chicken (36%) • Water • Irish Ham (13%) [(Pork 92%), Water, Salt, Stabilisers (Sodium Triphosphate, Sodium Polyphosphate), Glucose Syrup, Dextrose, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein (contains Soya), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate), Preservative (Sodium Nitrite), Sugar] • Bacon [(Pork 86%), Water, Salt, Preservatives (Sodium Nitrite, Potassium Nitrate), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate)] • White Wine (contains Sulphites) • Wheat Flour • Mushroom • White Onion • Whole Milk Powder • Margarine [Non-hydrogenated Vegetable Oils (Palm Oil, Rapeseed Oil), Water, Salt] •Garlic • Vegetable Oil (Non-hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil) • Cornflour • Salt • Vegetable Bouillon [Salt, Yeast Extract, Potato Starch, Sugar, Onion Powder, Herb, Acid (Citric Acid), Carrot Powder, Spice, Spice Extract (contains Celery)] • Thyme • Parsley • Black Pepper • Poppy Seed.

  • Filling ingredients

    • (50%): Irish Chicken (36%) • Water • Irish Ham (13%) [(Pork 92%), Water, Salt, Stabilisers (Sodium Triphosphate, Sodium Polyphosphate), Glucose Syrup, Dextrose, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein (contains Soya), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate), Preservative (Sodium Nitrite), Sugar] • Bacon [(Pork 86%), Water, Salt, Preservatives (Sodium Nitrite, Potassium Nitrate), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate)] • White Wine (contains Sulphites) • Wheat Flour • Mushroom • White Onion • Whole Milk Powder • Margarine [Non-hydrogenated Vegetable Oils (Palm Oil, Rapeseed Oil), Water, Salt] •Garlic • Vegetable Oil (Non-hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil) • Cornflour • Salt • Vegetable Bouillon [Salt, Yeast Extract, Potato Starch, Sugar, Onion Powder, Herb, Acid (Citric Acid), Carrot Powder, Spice, Spice Extract (contains Celery)] • Thyme • Parsley • Black Pepper • Poppy Seed.

  • Pie Ingredients

    • (50%): Irish Chicken (36%) • Water • Irish Ham (13%) [(Pork 92%), Water, Salt, Stabilisers (Sodium Triphosphate, Sodium Polyphosphate), Glucose Syrup, Dextrose, Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein (contains Soya), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate), Preservative (Sodium Nitrite), Sugar] • Bacon [(Pork 86%), Water, Salt, Preservatives (Sodium Nitrite, Potassium Nitrate), Antioxidant (Sodium Ascorbate)] • White Wine (contains Sulphites) • Wheat Flour • Mushroom • White Onion • Whole Milk Powder • Margarine [Non-hydrogenated Vegetable Oils (Palm Oil, Rapeseed Oil), Water, Salt] •Garlic • Vegetable Oil (Non-hydrogenated Rapeseed Oil) • Cornflour • Salt • Vegetable Bouillon [Salt, Yeast Extract, Potato Starch, Sugar, Onion Powder, Herb, Acid (Citric Acid), Carrot Powder, Spice, Spice Extract (contains Celery)] • Thyme • Parsley • Black Pepper • Poppy Seed.
